about_me: I am a Senior Python Developer / Contractor / Freelancer with 7+ years of experience, only interested in remote work.
I help companies around the world to design and implement their software solutions.
Let's have a talk and see how my expertise can help your business.

experience.challenge: The client, a Belgian company specialized in construction, was wasting a significant amount of time. The lack of an efficient solution to planning work resources, such as work teams and materials that caused bookings to occasionally overlap
contribution: Designed and implemented the core of a custom-tailored resource management platform to be used by the company managers to plan and track day-to-day work. Thus, ensured over 1M eur in revenues.
Created necessary pipelines for CI/CD, which led to the increase of efficiency by more than 30% in the process of software developmen.

experience.challenge: The client, a multinational corporation that had multiple HR software for different regions, was wasting a significant amount of time in manually fixing account issues. To implement a centralized platform was required.
contribution: Developed an internal application to automate the HR process. As a result the number of tickets related to account issues went down by 80%. As well as there were no more hires without credentials. Additionally, all accounts worldwide could be filled out using the same template.

experience.challenge: The client, a local architecture company, was dealing with a significant number of deadline breaches. It required a solution to keep track of contract.
contribution: Created visibility in contracts by developing an user friendly and highly intuitive web application, which made the most through the versatility of Django's framework. As a result over 300k eur in revenue were secured.

education.title: MSc, Distributed Systems and Web Tech
